---
title: "My Iris Dashboard"
author: "Ikansh Mahajan"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: rows
    vertical_layout: fill
    source_code: embed
runtime: shiny
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(flexdashboard)
library(shiny)

data(iris)
df <- iris
```

## Row {data-height=200}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Number of clusters

```{r}
sliderInput(
    "n.cluster",
    label = NULL,
    min = 1,
    max = nrow(iris),
    value = 3,
    step = 1,
    ticks = FALSE
)
```

### Number of iterations

```{r}
sliderInput(
    "n.iter",
    label = NULL,
    min = 1,
    max = 300,
    value = 20,
    ticks = FALSE
)
```
